summary:
It's just a fly-by operation 🌟
Who's ready for Captain Marvel to come out this week????? Oh boi I sure am 😍💙❤💛
Absolutely...
body:
It’s just a fly-by operation 🌟

Who’s ready for Captain Marvel to come out this week????? Oh boi I sure am 😍💙❤💛

Absolutely Marvel-ous costume made by and borrowed from @kittmyth/@Jayne_Kitt - thank you so much! She’s a stunner!

Captain Marvel: @peggycosplays

📸 @noblelunatic

summary: It’s Captain Marvel week! Carol Danvers as Captain Marvel by Adam Hughes While I much prefer her costume as Miss Marvel (or any...
caption:
It’s Captain Marvel week!

Carol Danvers as Captain Marvel by Adam Hughes

While I much prefer her costume as Miss Marvel (or any of her previous costumes, to be honest), I understand why that’s not the best idea for the MCU. Here’s hoping Brie Larsen delivers on all our hopes for this character and this franchise.

reblog.comment:
It’s Captain Marvel week!

Carol Danvers as Captain Marvel by Adam Hughes

While I much prefer her costume as Miss Marvel (or any of her previous costumes, to be honest), I understand why that’s not the best idea for the MCU. Here’s hoping Brie Larsen delivers on all our hopes for this character and this franchise.

trail.content_raw:

blog.title: Me vale vrga prro
blog.description: Mexican | Female | 19 | fan and shipper | AoT-JJBA-MadoMagi-Death Note-RWBY- LWA- Go Nagai - DDLC - Berserk  | Don't touch my babies|

body:
Dear people

Captain Marvel isn’t hated because “so much feminism”

NO

People hates Captain Marvel thanks to the bad marketing strategy calling her “the most strongest hero”, besides Brie doesn’t help with her aggressive comments to the target public of the movie

Ah, and also, the Captain Marvel comics wasn’t succesfull, being cancelled thanks to the bad selling and zero charm of the character

So please, stop that pathetic discourse of “it’s white men’s fault” because the truth isn’t that
